__e: one night last August, I called Alice to the telephone.
What happened to you... on the evening ofAugust 2 1 of last year?

Let's go back in time... back into the past... to the night of August 2nd of this year.

They advised me not to reapply for contract renewal after the end of my contract, which was coming up to an end in August. And the following day I resigned.
There isn't a day that I don't remember August 4th and I think about Anne Frank.
August is not who he seems he is, Mary.
